oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cool Springs Baptist: fieldnotes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Fieldnotes of Cool Springs Baptist. Notes document the location of the church in relation to downtown and an older African American neighborhood.

Exuding architectural features of the mid-twentieth century, Cool Springs Baptist Church's current building is situated between downtown Henderson and a historic African American neighborhood. Henderson Cemetery, the city's large public cemetery on North Church Avenue, lies just to the southeast of Cool Springs Baptist Church.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee
